servī: in ātriīs domūs Deī nostrī. ^ you that stand in the house of the Lord
Dominum: in the courts of the house of our God.

servī: quia bonus Dominus; psallite nōminī ejus
Dominum: quoniam suāve. ^ Praise ye the Lord
^ Praise ye the name of the Lord; O you: for the Lord is good; sing ye to his name

servī: Isrāēlem in possessiōnem sibī. ^ For the Lord hath chosen Jacob unto himself

1 ^ Laudāte nōmen Dominī; laudāte: 5 ^ Quia egō cognōvī quod magnus est Dominus
servī: et Deus noster prae omnibus deīs. ^ For I have known that the Lord is great
Dominum: and our God is above all gods.

praise the Lord: et in omnibus abissīs. ^ Whatsoever the Lord pleased he hath done

servī: fulgura in pluviam fēcit; quī prōdūcit ventōs dē tēsaurīs suīs. ^ He bringeth up clouds from the end of the earth; he hath made lightnings for the rain. He bringeth forth winds out of his stores.

1 ^ Laudāte nōmen Dominī; laudāte: 8 ^ Quī percussit prīmōgenita Aegiptī ab homine usque ad pecus. ^ He slew the firstborn of Egypt from man even unto beast.

^ Praise ye the name of the Lord; O you: et in omnēs servōs ejus. ^ He sent forth signs and wonders in the midst of thee

servī: et occīdit rēgēs fortēs; ^ He smote many nations

Dominum: et omnia regna Chanaānis. ^ Sehon king of the Amorites
praise the Lord: and all the kingdoms of Chanaan.

servī: hērēditātem Isrāēlī populō suō. ^ And gave their land for an inheritance
Dominum: for an inheritance to his people Israel.
memoriāle tuum in generātiōnem et generātiōnem. ^ Thy name

servī: et in servīs suīs dēprecābitur. ^ For the Lord will judge his people
Dominum: and will be entreated in favour of his servants.

servī: opera manuum hominum. ^ The idols of the Gentiles are silver and gold

Dominum: et nōn vidēbunt. ^ They have a mouth
^ Praise ye the name of the Lord; O you: but they speak not; they have eyes

servī: et nōn audient; neque enim est spīritus in ōre ipsōrum. ^ They have ears
Dominum: but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.

1 ^ Laudāte nōmen Dominī; laudāte: 18 ^ Similēs illīs fīant quī faciunt ea
servī: et omnēs quī confīdunt in eīs. ^ Let them that make them be like to them
Dominum: and every one that trusteth in them.

^ Praise ye the name of the Lord; O you: O house of Israel; bless the Lord
O house of Levi; you that fear the Lord

servī: quī habitat in Jerusalem. ^ Blessed be the Lord out of Sion
